data.title: First Horizon Christian Academy
data.text:
Our mission at First Horizon Christian Academy is to make sure you child is raised to know Jesus while growing and learning in a safe, developmentally appropriate, loving environment. We understand that the first five years of a child’s life is monumentally important for positivity in their health, wellbeing and overall experience with life. Our program philosophy is that we believe the daycare /preschool, the child’s home, the church and the community all contribute to a well-rounded childhood and that it truly takes a village. In our small community, we strive to keep childcare affordable and convenient for your child’s first education experience. We are located in Lake City, Florida.

At First Horizon Christian Academy, we believe the child’s home, the school, the church and the community contribute to a well-rounded childhood and that it truly takes a village. We want to help strengthen the family by including them in their child’s educational goals.
